tls:line.title: 南宗頓教最上大乘摩訶般若波羅蜜經六祖惠能大師於韶州大梵寺施法壇經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: What are the ten thousand hundred billion Nirmānakāya Buddhas? [Why these billions, one wonders. CH]

sense.def: BUDDH: "transformation body"; this refers to a Buddha's body transformed into the physical shape of a sentient being as expedient means to teach and liberate them; the transformaton body is equipped with supernatural qualitites in order to assess and adapt to the capacities of sentient beings; SANSKRIT: nirmāna-kāya
